CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DCB |
| TCB |

In the given paragraph, DCB and TCB are the material names mentioned. DCB stands for Decane-1,2,3,4-tetra carboxylic bis(2-methoxyethyl) ester and TCB stands for 1,2,4-Trichlorobenzene.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DCB |
| TCB |

In the given paragraph, DCB and TCB are the only two expressions that can be interpreted as material names. The other expressions, "the solvent," "could be further improved," and "the photovoltaic performance" are not material names.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB |

In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entity refers to the change in the solvent from DCB (dichlorobenzene) to TCB (1,2,4-trichlorobenzene). This change is described as a single event, and it is the only potential "Property Value" entity in the text.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB |

In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entity refers to the change in the solvent from DCB (dichlorobenzene) to TCB (1,2,4-trichlorobenzene). This change is described as a single event, and it is the only potential "Property Value" entity in the text.

The other phrases in the paragraph, such as "When the solvent was changed" and "could be further improved," do not clearly refer to a value of a material property and are not included in the table.
